titles.title: Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2024
Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2024

To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide for a pilot program under which development loans and loan guarantees may be made to beginning farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit
